skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dan river gospel
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The efforts of Dan River Gospel is a local focus; specifically to Danville, southside Virginia and northern North Carolina. For many years there has been no outlet for local King James Bible preachers to broadcast their weekly sermons on terrestrial radio. That being said if ministers outside our local area request a broadcast we may consider airing them. And yes absolutely all are invited to listen. Praise The Lord and rejoice along with the folks in Virginia and North Carolina.

Please visit danrivergospel.org for much more about Dan River Gospel!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
